attributes.action: publish figures relating to this petition service's actual effectiveness
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How many petitions have been started?
How many signatures on each? 
What proportion of them are actually responded to?
What proportion of them actually result in any governmental change?
Could we please have a review, so that readers can be fully informed about these petitons' actual usefulness (or lack thereof)

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
